title: Making Deepfakes Gets Cheaper and Easier Thanks to A.I.
description: Meme-makers and misinformation peddlers are embracing artificial intelligence tools to create convincing fake videos on the cheap.

title: Fox’s P.R. Woes May Not Directly Translate to Legal Ones
description: Some of the unflattering private messages among the network’s hosts and executives may never become evidence when Dominion Voting Systems’ defamation case against Fox News goes to trial.
